item.name: Darkvision Eyeshadow
entries: Ein kleiner Behälter mit {@dice 1d6+2} Verwendungen eines tiefvioletten Pulvers.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Pause um die Augen herum aufgetragen werden und bleibt 24 Stunden lang bestehen, sofern sie nicht entfernt wird.
Während der Anwendung kann der Träger bis zu 30 Fuß weit im Dunkeln sehen.

item.name: Fan Lashes
entries: Ein weißer Wimpernaufschlag.
Während der Träger diese Wimpern trägt, kann er einmal am Tag eine Aktion ausführen, um mit seinen Wimpern zu flattern und einen Windstoß in einer Linie von 15 Fuß zu erzeugen.
Jede Kreatur, die vom Wind getroffen wird, muss einen DC13 Stärke-Rettungswurf machen oder wird 5 Fuß zurückgestoßen.

item.name: Flame Lashes
entries: Ein Paar dichte, kurze, dunkelrote Wimpern.

Als Aktion kannst du einen Fernkampf-Zauberangriff (+2 auf Angriff) ausführen, während ein einzelner Strahl aus jeder der Peitschen (insgesamt 2 Strahlen) auf ein bestimmtes Ziel schießt. Jeder Strahl verursacht bei einem Treffer {@dice 1d12} Feuerschaden.
Die Wimpern werden bei dem Angriff verbrannt.

item.name: Insightful Eyeshadow
entries: Ein Glasbehälter mit {@dice 1d6+2} Verwendungen eines blauen Pulvers.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause um die Augen herum aufgetragen werden und bleibt 24 Stunden lang anwendbar.
Jede Kreatur, die vom Wind getroffen wird, muss einen DC13 Stärke-Rettungswurf machen, um 5 Fuß zurückgestoßen zu werden.

Wenn du dich während der Anwendung darauf konzentrierst, 1 Minute lang Augenkontakt mit einer Kreatur zu halten, die du sehen kannst, erfährst du eine Information deiner Wahl über die unten aufgeführte Kreatur; sobald du diese Information erfahren hast, kannst du nichts mehr von dieser Kreatur erfahren:

item.name: Lashes of Charming
entries: Ein Paar Katzenaugenwimpern.
Sie können während einer kurzen oder langen Pause angewendet werden.

Einmal am Tag, während der Träger diese Wimpern trägt, kann er eine Aktion nutzen, um mit seinen Wimpern auf eine Kreatur zu flattern, die er im Umkreis von 30 Fuß sehen kann, und das Ziel mit dem Zauber Person verzaubern (Save DC15) zu belegen.

item.name: Readers Eyeshadow
entries: Ein kleiner Behälter mit {@dice 1d6+2} Verwendungen eines rosa Pulvers.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Pause um die Augen herum aufgetragen werden und bleibt 24 Stunden lang bestehen, sofern sie nicht entfernt wird.
Während der Anwendung kann der Träger die Sprache lesen, die auf dem Behälter angegeben ist.
Sie ermöglicht es Ihnen nicht, die Sprache zu sprechen, zu schreiben oder auf andere Weise als durch Lesen zu verstehen.

item.name: Revealing Lashes
entries: Ein Paar glitzernde, puppenförmige Wimpern.
Wenn du mit diesen Wimpern schielst, hast du einen Nachteil bei Prüfungen, die Sicht erfordern, kannst aber einen leuchtenden Umriss um unsichtbare Kreaturen und Objekte sehen.

item.name: True Sight Eyeshadow
entries: Ein kleiner Behälter mit {@dice 1d6+2} Anwendungen eines schimmernden mintfarbenen Pulvers.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Pause um die Augen herum aufgetragen werden und bleibt 24 Stunden lang bestehen, sofern sie nicht entfernt wird.
Während der Träger die Illusorische Schrift anwendet, kann er sie durchschauen, aber sie erscheint als normale Schrift in der Hand und Sprache, die sie geschrieben hat.
Der Träger hat außerdem einen Vorteil bei Erkundungs(Intelligenz)-Prüfungen gegen Illusionen.

item.name: Shade-eye Lashes
entries: Ein Paar lange, dichte schwarze Wimpern.
Wenn du diese Wimpern trägst, hast du einen Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Blindheit.

item.name: Magicseeker Eyeshadow
entries: Ein kleiner Behälter mit {@dice 1d6+2} Verwendungen eines glitzernden blauen Pulvers.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Pause um die Augen herum aufgetragen werden und bleibt 24 Stunden lang bestehen, sofern sie nicht entfernt wird.
Während der Anwendung kann der Träger das Vorhandensein von Magie innerhalb eines Kegels von 15 Fuß erkennen.
Eine schwache Aura erscheint um magische Kreaturen oder Objekte, die sichtbar sind.

item.name: Choking Fragrance
entries: Ein kleines Glasfläschchen mit {@dice 1d6+2} eines grünen Parfüms, das bei Kreaturen einen Würgereiz auslöst, wenn sie daran riechen.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.

Während dieser Duft angewendet wird, müssen feindliche Kreaturen im Umkreis von 5 Fuß einen DC13 Rettungswurf auf Konstitution machen. Bei einem Fehlschlag beginnt die Kreatur zu husten und hat einen Nachteil bei allen Angriffswürfen, Fertigkeitsprüfungen und Rettungswürfen.
Jede betroffene Kreatur kann den Rettungswurf am Ende jeder ihrer Runden wiederholen.
Bei einem Erfolg ist die Kreatur für die nächsten 24 Stunden immun gegen die Wirkung dieses Duftes.
Wenn sich die Kreatur nicht mehr innerhalb von 5 Fuß um dich herum befindet, endet der Effekt.

item.name: Courage Fragrance
entries: Eine kleine Glasflasche mit {@dice 1d6+2} Verwendungen eines goldenen Parfüms, das beim Riechen Gefühle von Vertrauen und Mut hervorruft.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
Während dieses Parfüm aufgetragen wird, haben du und alle freundlichen Kreaturen im Umkreis von 5 Fuß, die diesen Duft riechen können, Vorteil bei Rettungswürfen gegen Furchteffekte.

item.name: Diplomat Fragrance
entries: Eine kleine Glasflasche, die {@dice 1d6+2} eines blauen Parfüms enthält, das eine Nebelwolke um Sie herum erzeugt.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
Du hast einen Vorteil bei auf Charisma basierenden Fertigkeitsprüfungen gegen alle Kreaturen, die sich im Umkreis von 5 Fuß um dich befinden und diesen Duft riechen können.

item.name: Daze Fragrance
entries: Eine kleine Glasflasche, die {@dice 1d6+2} eines weinfarbenen Parfüms enthält, das es schwierig macht, sich beim Riechen zu konzentrieren.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.

Während dieses Parfüm aufgetragen wird, müssen alle feindlichen Kreaturen, die sich zu Beginn ihres Zuges in einem Umkreis von 5 Fuß von dir befinden und diesen Duft riechen können, einen Rettungswurf der Weisheit (DC13) ablegen, oder die Kreatur verliert den Fokus und führt in diesem Zug keine Aktion durch.
Bei einem Erfolg ist die Kreatur für die nächsten 24 Stunden immun gegen die Wirkung dieses Duftes.

item.name: Faith Fragrance
entries: Eine kleine Glasflasche mit {@dice 1d6+2} Verwendungen eines silbernen Parfüms, das nach Eisen riecht.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
While this perfume is applied aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends and undead creatures within 5 ft. of you have disadvantage on saving throws and attack rolls.

item.name: Invigorate Fragrance
entries: A small glass bottle containing {@dice 1d6+2} uses of a bright orange perfume that energizes and emboldens you.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
While applied friendly creatures within 5 ft. that can smell deal extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier (max +4) on all non magical damage rolls.

item.name: Love Fragrance
entries: A small glass bottle containing {@dice 1d6+2} uses of a rosy red perfume that invokes the sensation of love when smelled.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
While this perfume is applied, any creatures within 5 ft. of you that can smell must on a DC13 Charisma saving throw.
On a failed save the creature is {@condition charmed} by you, the creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of it's turns.
Bei einem Erfolg ist die Kreatur für die nächsten 24 Stunden immun gegen die Wirkung dieses Duftes.

item.name: Serenity Fragrance
entries: A small glass bottle containing {@dice 1d6+2} uses of a deep purple perfume that calms the mind when smelled.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
While this perfume is applied, you and any friendly creatures within 5 ft. that can smell has advantage on saving throws against charm effects.

item.name: Rejuvenate Fragrance
entries: A small glass bottle containing {@dice 1d6+2} uses of a deep red perfume that invigorates you with liveliness when smelled
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
While this perfume is applied, you and any friendly creatures within 5 ft. that can smell restores the maximum amount of hit points from any healing spells or hit die that are used.

item.name: Unveil Fragrance
entries: A small glass bottle containing {@dice 1d6+2} uses of a milky perfume that creates a cloud of mist around you.
Eine Anwendung kann während einer kurzen oder langen Ruhepause erfolgen und bleibt 6 Stunden lang oder bis zur Entfernung aufgetragen.
Invisible creatures or objects within 5 ft. of you have the mist cling to them, making them visible

item.name: Berry Dye
entries: A small bottle of deep red hair dye containing {@dice 1d4+1} uses.
One use can be applied during a short or long rest, and you can only dye your hair once every 24 hours.
Once applied it causes the hair to grow {@dice 1d6} berries, the berries can be removed and eaten as an action.
Once eaten the berries recover {@dice 1d4+1} hit points and remove {@condition poisoned}.
After 24 hours the berries wither losing all their properties.

item.name: Climber Wig
entries: A long blonde wig made with extremely strong strands of hair.
While wearing this wig you can extend the length of this hair up to 50 ft. as an action.
The hair can be climbed the same as a rope.

item.name: Collectors Wig
entries: This curly black wig has a surprising amount of volume to it that bounces easily
This wig has an extra-dimensional space within it, allowing the wearer to put any small or thing object into the wig.
The exact size is 3 cubic feet, and can hold up to 20 pounds.
Pulling an object out takes a bonus action and the wearer has to have seen the object before.
If the wig is removed, all items that where placed inside fall out.

item.name: Hair Growth Tonic
entries: A small greenish bottle containing {@dice 1d4+1} uses of a clear balm.
One use can be applied to 6 inch square surface of anything organic, during a short or long rest.
Once applied hair will begin growing from the surface within 24 hours and remain there for 1 week.
After which the hair will grow thin and brittle and fall off.

item.name: Helmet Wig
entries: The wearer of this wig can use an action to turn it into metal and form a plate helmet.
The wig grants a +1 to AC while it's in helmet form and you are not already wearing a helmet.
Switching it back to a wig takes an action

item.name: Shimmering Hair Dye
entries: A small bottle containing {@dice 1d4+1} uses of a yellow dye that faintly glows when swirled around.
One use can be applied during a short or long rest, and you can only dye your hair once every 24 hours.
Once applied it causes your hair to emit bright light up to 30 ft.
After 6 hours the hair fades and only emits dim light, after 12 hours the light fades completely and your hair no longer emits any light.

item.name: Smoke Dye
entries: A small bottle containing {@dice 1d4+1} uses of a gray dye that looks like smoke when swirled around.
One use can be applied during a short or long rest, and you can only dye your hair once every 24 hours.
Once applied it causes smoke to spill out from your hair for 6 hours.
All attack rolls against you that rely on sight are made with disadvantage due to the obscuring smoke.

item.name: Samson's Tonic
entries: A small bottle containing {@dice 1d4+1} uses of a reddish balm
One use can be applied during a short or long rest, and you can only dye your hair once every 24 hours.
While applied you gain advantage to all strength skill checks for 24 hours

item.name: Tangle Wig
entries: This red haired wig looks like a tangled mess, simply touching it can get your fingers caught in it.
While wearing this wig you can use an action to animate the hair and use it to restrain another creature within 5 ft. of you.
The creature must make a DC15 Strength saving throw, or become {@condition restrained}.
The creature can spend an action on each of it's turns to repeat the saving throw and attempt to break free.

item.name: Winged Wig
entries: This white haired wig flares outward on the sides, and is styles in a way that gives the appearance of wings.
You can use this wig to fly at a speed of 20 ft. for up to 6 hours, all at once or in several shorter flights, each one using a minimum of 1 minute from the duration.
If you are flying when the duration expires, you descend at a rate of 30 feet per round until you land.
The wig regains 3 hours of flight time for every 12 hours it isn't in use.

item.name: Lipstick of Sweet Words
entries: An iron tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a deep red lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While applied the wearer has advantage on all Charisma based skill checks against creatures that can see you.

item.name: Lipstick of Dreams
entries: A crystal tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a pastel purple lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While wearing this lipstick when you kiss a creature you can choose to expend it's magic to put them to sleep.
Roll {@dice 4d6} if the total is higher or equal to the target's current hit points then they fall asleep and are considered {@condition Unconscious}
Once the magic is expended the lipstick changes to a deep mauve color.

item.name: Lipstick of Flames
entries: A dark metal tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a bright red colored lipstick with flakes of gold.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While wearing this lipstick you can use an action to expend the magic and breathe a 15 ft. cone of fire.
Creatures within the cone must make a DC13 Dexterity saving throw or take {@dice 3d6} fire damage, or half as much on a success.
Once the magic is expended the lipstick changes to a natural red color.

item.name: Lipstick of Ice
entries: A crystal tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a pale blue lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While wearing this lipstick you can use an action to expend the magic and breathe a 15 ft. cone of ice and cold.
The terrain within the cone becomes covered in ice and is considered difficult terrain.
Any creature moving through this space must make a DC15 Dexterity save or fall prone.
Once the magic is expended the lipstick changes to a deeper blue color.

item.name: Lipstick of Languages
entries: A small gold tube with the name of a language etched onto the side, containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a light pink lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While applied the wearer can speak the language labeled on the tube.
This only affects speech, the wearer is not able to read or write the language unless otherwise capable of doing so.

item.name: Lipstick of Messages
entries: A small copper tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a glittering blue lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
By leaving a kiss mark on a surface you can leave a short message as per the {@spell magic mouth} spell however the kiss mark animates rather than a mouth appearing.
The kiss mark fades after the first time it repeats the message, and you can use this lipstick 3 times before it's magic is expended.
Once the magic is expended the lipstick loses it's glittering shine and becomes matte.

item.name: Lipstick of Purifying
entries: A small white tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a white lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While wearing this lipstick you cannot become poisoned from eating or drinking food.

item.name: Lipstick of Reviving
entries: A white gold tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a shimmering gold lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While wearing this lipstick you can use an action to expend the magic and cast {@spell revivify} by kissing a creature.
Once the magic is expended the lipstick fades off.

item.name: Lipstick of Sludge Spit
entries: A black tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a green lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While wearing this lipstick you can use a bonus action to choose a location within 15 ft., and spit a ball of sticky sludge that covers a 5 ft. square and remains for 3 rounds.
Any creature within or entering that space must make a DC13 Strength saving throw or become stuck, reducing their movement speed to 0 ft.
If stuck the creature can attempt to break free with a successful Strength save at the start of each of it's turns.
At the end of the 3 rounds when the sludge fades, any stuck creatures are no longer affected.

item.name: Lipstick of Hidden Space
entries: A small sparkling black tube containing {@dice 1d8+2} uses of a deep purple and silver lipstick.
One use can be applied to your lips during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While wearing this lipstick you can activate it's magic to transport a single small object able to fit within your mouth (coin, key, gemstone) to a temporary extra-dimensional space.
The object can be pulled back out at anytime or until the lipstick wears off or is removed, at which point the object appears back in your mouth.
There is only enough space for one object to be stored in this manner at any given time.

item.name: Arcanist Striker Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing an opalescent nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has this polish applied, you can use a bonus action to cast a single bolt of {@spell magic missile} at a target.
After this is used the magic is expended from that nail and it fades to white.

item.name: Clawhand Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a dark metallic gray nail polish that hardens into a metal coating, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has this polish applied and you are making a melee attack against another creature, you can choose to expend the magic from any nails with this polish on them.
If you do add 1 point of piercing damage for each nail expended in this way.
After the attack the polish cracks and breaks off the nail.

item.name: Grave Touch Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a green nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has the polish applied and you are touching another creature, you can use an action to expend the magic from as many nails as you choose.
When you do you deal 1 point of necrotic damage for each nail expended in this way, you also regain health equal to the amount of damage dealt to the creature by this effect.
After the magic is expended from the nail it fades to a black color.

item.name: Powerarm Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a glossy magenta nail polish that faintly glows, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
When you make an unarmed strike and at least one nail has this polish applied, you can expend the magic from one nail to make the strike magical for overcoming resistances.
The strike also gets +1 to attack and damage rolls, once expended the nail polish fades to a cyan color.

item.name: Prima Prisma Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a glittering rainbow nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has the nail polish applied, you can use an action to expend the magic in one nail and cast {@spell color spray}.
If all ten nails have the polish applied you can use an action to release the magic from all the nails at once to cast {@spell prismatic spray}.
After the magic is expended from a nail the polish becomes a flat white color.

item.name: Razzle Dazzle Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a sparkling silver nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has the nail polish applied, you can use a bonus action to cast {@spell prestidigitation} and perform a single minor magical trick that goes off instantly.
After that the magic is expended from the nail and it fades to a light blue.

item.name: Rejuvenation Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a red nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has the nail polish applied and you are touching another creature, you can use an action to expend the magic from as many nails you choose.
For each nail expended you can heal 1 hit point of the creature you are touching.
After that the magic is expended from the nail it fades to a white color.

item.name: Safecracker Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a silver nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has this polish applied you can touch a lock and gain +1 to your next skill check to unlock it for each nail you choose to expend.
After the magic is expended from the nail it fades to a plum color.

item.name: Snap Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a clear nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has this polish applied you can snap your your fingers as a bonus action to expend the magic in one nail.
The sound of the snap is amplified and deals {@dice 1d4} force damage to any creature within 5 ft. of you.

item.name: Spectral Reach Nailpolish
entries: A bottle containing a glittering blue nail polish, it contains enough for {@dice 1d6+4} uses.
Can only be applied during a short or long rest and remains applied until removed, one use is enough to cover a single nail.
While at least one nail has this polish applied, you can use a bonus action to cast {@spell mage hand} and have it perform a single action before it disappears.
After that the magic is expended from the nail and it fades to a matte purple.

item.name: Blurring Cream
entries: A small container containing a white cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the face during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While this facial cream is applied, it becomes difficult for creatures to remember your face.

item.name: Color Lotion
entries: A small container of cream that comes in variety of colors, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the skin during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While applied, the creatures skin becomes the color of the lotion for 24 hours.

item.name: Cooling Lotion
entries: A small container with a blue cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the skin during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
Applying this lotion gives you resistance to fire damage, and you do not receive exhaustion when exposed to hot temperatures for an extended period.

item.name: Face Cream of Many Faces
entries: A small container with a dazzling multi colored cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the face during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While applying this cream to your face, imagine another humanoid creature you've seen before and the cream will alter your face to match.
This effect lasts as long as the cream is applied.

item.name: Silkskin Cream
entries: A small container with a pale yellow cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the half the body during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While applied, this cream will make you immune to petrification.
When this cream is fully applied (two uses) to a creature already {@condition petrified}, the petrification will be removed.

item.name: Skulker Cream
entries: A small container with a black cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the skin during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While this cream is applied you are able to fade into the shadows, you have advantage on stealth checks while within shadows.
Attacks against you also have disadvantage while you are within shadows.

item.name: Slick Lotion
entries: A small container with clear cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the skin during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While applied you have advantage on escaping from being restrained or grappled.

item.name: Stoneskin Lotion
entries: A small container with a gray shimmering cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the skin during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
When this skin is applied to a creature their skin hardens into a rough bark like surface.
The creature then gains +1 to their AC while not wearing any armor.

item.name: Ward Cream
entries: A small container with a sparkling light purple cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the skin during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
While applied you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage from the first attack that hits you.
This only applies only to the first strike that hits you, and the lotion must be reapplied before you can gain this effect again.

item.name: Warming Lotion
entries: A small container with an orange cream, it has enough cream for {@dice 1d4+2} uses.
One use can be applied to the skin during a short or long rest and remains applied for 24 hours, unless removed.
Applying this lotion gives you resistance to cold damage, and you do not receive exhaustion when exposed to cold temperatures for an extended period.
